snippet: The sentence for the murder of a teenager who was abducted, choked, beaten and set on fire sealed a case that has roiled Israelis and Palestinians.
abstract: Yosef Haim Ben-David, Israeli man convicted of murdering Palestinian teenager Muhammad Abu Khdeir in 2014, is sentenced to life in prison and additional 20 years.
lead_paragraph: The sentence for the murder of a teenager who was abducted, choked, beaten and set on fire sealed a case that has roiled Israelis and Palestinians.

headline.main: Israeli Gets Life in Prison for Murder of Palestinian Teenager
headline.print_headline: Israel Sentenced to Life for Killing a Palestinian
